sen.j: 佐井通（さいどおり）は京都市の南北の通り。
sen.e: Sai-dori Street is one of the major north-south running streets of Kyoto City.
Sai-dori Street is one of the major north-south streets in Kyoto City.
Sai-dori Street is one of the major north-south streets in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 西大路通の西に位置し北は鹿苑寺付近の、北区 (京都市)平野天神森町から南は八条通の南までとなっている。
sen.e: The street located west of the Nishioji-dori Street starts, in the north, from Hirano-jinja and Kinugasa-Tenjinmoricho near Rokuon-ji Temple and, in the north, leads to the south of Hachijo-dori Street.
sen.cmt: http://web.kyoto-inet.or.jp/people/kurituka/torina.hthttp://kaiwai.city.kyoto.jp/search/view_sight.php?ManageCode=1000243&InforKindCode=1&whole=truehttp://www.excite.co.jp/map/address/26/]平野天神森町→Hirano-jinja and Kinugasa-Tenjinmoricho[該当する地名はなく、「平野神社および衣笠天神森町」と訳出しました。http://kaiwai.city.kyoto.jp/search/view_sight.php?ManageCode=3000085&InforKindCode=1&whole=true
sen.e: The street located west of Nishioji-dori Street starts, in the north, from Hirano-jinja and Kinugasa-Tenjinmoricho near Rokuon-ji Temple and, in the north, leads to the south of Hachijo-dori Street.

The street located west of Nishioji-dori Street starts in the north, from Kinugasa-Tenjinmori-cho near Rokuon-ji Temple in Kita Ward (Kyoto City), and in the south it leads to the south of Hachijo-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 京都市北区 追加 佐井通りは、「平野天神森町」からスタートではなく、衣笠天神森町 からのスタートのようですので、そのように修正しました。

sen.j: 途中四条通との交差点付近に西院春日神社があり、春日通の通称で呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is commonly called Kasuga-dori Street, because Saiin-Kasuga-jinja Shrin is around the crossing with Shijo-dori Street.
It is commonly called Kasuga-dori Street because Saiin-Kasuga-jinja Shrine is around the crossing with Shijo-dori Street.
It is commonly called Kasuga-dori Street because Saiin-Kasuga-jinja Shrine is located in the vicinityof the crossing with Shijo-dori Street.
sen.cmt: located in the vicinity ofとしました。

sen.j: 五条付近ではクリスマスの季節には沿道のロームによりイルミネーションが行われる。
sen.e: In a area around Gojo, ROHM, Co. decorates the street with Christmas illumination every year.
In the area around Gojo, the ROHM, Co. decorates the street with Christmas illumination every year.
In the area around Gojo, the ROHM Co., Ltd., decorates the street with Christmas illumination every year.
